text: Se considerÄƒ  algoritmul  magic(x) , unde  x este un numÄƒr  natural (1  â‰¤ x â‰¤ 32000). PrecizaÈ›i care dintre urmÄƒtoarele afirmaÈ›ii sunt adevÄƒrate:
code:
Algorithm magic(x):
    st â† 1
    dr â† x
    While st â‰¤ dr execute
        mj â† (st + dr) DIV 2
        If mj * mj = x then
            return True
        EndIf
        If mj * mj < x then
            st â† mj + 1
        else
            dr â† mj â€“ 1
        EndIf
    EndWhile
    return False
EndAlgorithm

text: Pentru un numÄƒr natural nr (1000 â‰¤ nr â‰¤ 1000000), definim operaÈ›ia de decrementare Ã®n modul urmÄƒtor: dacÄƒ ultima cifrÄƒ a lui nr nu este 0, scÄƒdem 1 din nr, altfel, Ã®mpÄƒrÈ›im nr la 10 È™i pÄƒstrÄƒm doar partea Ã®ntreagÄƒ. Care dintre urmÄƒtorii algoritmi returneazÄƒ, la apelul  decrementare(nr, k) ,  numÄƒrul obÈ›inut aplicÃ¢nd de k ori (0 â‰¤ k â‰¤ 100) operaÈ›ia de decrementare pe numÄƒrul nr? De exemplu, pentru nr = 15243 È™i k = 10, rezultatul este 151.

answers.text:
Algorithm decrementare(nr, k):
    If k = 0 then
        return nr
    else
        If nr MOD 10 â‰  0 then
     return decrementare(nr - 1, k - 1)
        Else
            return decrementare(nr DIV 10, k - 1)
        EndIf
    EndIf
EndAlgorithm

Algorithm decrementare(nr, k):
While k > 0 execute
If nr MOD 10 = 0 then
nr â† nr DIV 10
else
nr â† nr - 1
EndIf
k â† k - 1
EndWhile
return nr
End Algorithm

Algorithm decrementare(nr, k):
For i â† 1, k execute
If nr MOD 10 > 0 then
nr â† nr DIV 10
else
nr â† nr - 1
EndIf
EndFor
return nr
EndAlgorithm

Algorithm decrementare(nr, k):
    If k = 0 then
        return nr
    else
        If k > nr MOD 10 then
            nr1 â† nr DIV 10
            return decrementare(nr1,   k - nr MOD 10 - 1)
        else
            return decrementare(nr - k, 0)
        EndIf
    EndIf
EndAlgorithm

Algorithm fn(v, n):

        EndWhile

EndAlgorithm

Algorithm magic(s, n):

Algoritmul ceFace(n)  are ca parametru de intrare un numÄƒr natural n (0 â‰¤ n â‰¤ 10000).


Algorithm ceFace(n):

Algoritmul generare(n)  prelucreazÄƒ un numÄƒr natural n (0 < n < 100).

Algorithm generare(n):
    nr â† 0
    For i â† 1, 1801 execute
        used[i] â† False
    EndFor
    While not  used[n] execute
        sum â† 0
        used[n] â† True
        While n â‰  0 execute
            digit â† n MOD 10
            n â† n DIV 10
            sum â† sum + digit * digit * digit
        EndWhile
        n â† sum
        nr â† nr + 1
    EndWhile
    return nr
EndAlgorithm

text: Se considerÄƒ algoritmul  ceFace(T, n, e) , care primeÈ™te ca È™i parametru un È™ir T cu n numere naturale ordonate crescÄƒtor ( T[1], T[2], â€¦, T[n]) È™i numerele naturale n È™i e (1 â‰¤ n, e â‰¤ 10000). PrecizaÈ›i care dintre urmÄƒtoarele afirmaÈ›ii sunt adevÄƒrate:

Algorithm ceFace(T, n, e):
If e MOD 2 = 0 then
a â† 1
b â† n
While a â‰¤ b execute
m â† (a + b) DIV 2
If e < T[m] then
b â† m - 1
else
If e > T[m] then
a â† m + 1
else
return m
EndIf
EndIf
EndWhile
return 0
else
c â† 1
g â† 0
While (c â‰¤ n) AND (g = 0) execute
If e = T[c] then
g = c
EndIf
c â† c + 1
EndWhile
return g
EndIf
EndAlgorithm

text: Se dÄƒ algoritmul s(a, b, c),  unde a, b, c sunt numere naturale pozitive (1 â‰¤ a, b, c â‰¤ 10000).
code:
Algorithm s(a, b, c):
If (a = 1) OR (b = 1) OR (c = 1) then
return 1
else
If a > b then
return a * s(a - 1, b, c)
else
If a < b then
return b * s(a, b - 1, c)
else
return c * s(a - 1, b - 1, c - 1)
EndIf
EndIf
EndIf
EndAlgorithm

Algorithm numere(a, b, c, d, e):
    If a = 0 AND b = 0 then
        If e = 0 then
            return True
        else
            return False
        EndIf
    EndIf

        e = e + 1
    EndIf

        e = e â€“ 1
    EndIf
    return numere(a DIV c, b DIV c, c, d, e)
EndAlgorithm

text: Se considerÄƒ urmÄƒtorul algoritm recursiv fibonacci(n) , unde n este un numÄƒr natural (1 â‰¤ n â‰¤ 100).   SÄƒ se determine de cÃ¢te ori se afiÈ™eazÄƒ mesajul â€œAici â€ Ã®n cazul unui apel fibonacci(n) .

Algorithm fibonacci(n):
